experiments.title: Attention Visualizer
experiments.description: Interactive visualization of transformer attention patterns across layers and heads. See how models attend to different tokens in real-time.

experiments.title: Gradient Descent Playground
experiments.description: Explore different optimization algorithms on various loss landscapes. Compare SGD, Adam, RMSProp, and more.

experiments.title: Distributed Training Simulator
experiments.description: Simulate data parallel and model parallel training strategies. Visualize communication overhead and scaling efficiency.

experiments.title: Clinical NER Demo
experiments.description: Named entity recognition on clinical text. Highlights medications, conditions, procedures, and anatomy in real-time.
